name: PetPooja Orders
query:
SELECT 
    name, 
    status,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.orderID'),'"','')OrderID,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.status'),'"','')OrderStatus,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.sub_order_type'),'"','')SubOrderType,    
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.payment_type'),'"','')PaymentType,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.custom_payment_type'),'"','')CustomPaymentType,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.total'),'"','') TotalAmount,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.order_from'),'"','') OrderFrom,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.order_type'),'"','') OrderType,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Order.created_on'),'"','') createdOn,
    REPLACE(JSON_EXTRACT(data,'$.properties.Restaurant.res_name'),'"','') Branch
FROM `tabPet Pooja Log`
order by createdon desc;
